name: Electric field instrument (Langmuir probe measurements at 2Hz)
description: The EFIXLPI_1B Product contains the EFIX_LP_1B plasma data interpolated at full UTC seconds, the same as the low resolution magnetic data MAG_LR.
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
Timestamp,-,Time stamp,1,CDF_EPOCH
SyncStatus,-,Synchronization status,1,CDF_UINT2
Latitude,deg,Position in ITRF – Latitude,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Longitude,deg,Position in ITRF – Longitude,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Radius,m,Position in ITRF – Radius,1,CDF_DOUBLE
U_orbit,m/s,Spacecraft velocity in the ITRF,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Ne,cm-3,Plasma density (electron),1,CDF_DOUBLE
Ne_error,cm-3,Error estimate of plasma density (Ne),1,CDF_DOUBLE
Te,K,Plasma electron temperature,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Te_error,K,Error estimate of plasma electron temperature (Te),1,CDF_DOUBLE
Vs,V,Spacecraft potential,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Vs_error,V,Error estimate of spacecraft potential (U_pol),1,CDF_DOUBLE
Flags_LP,-,"Flags indicating the source/method of LP measurements (ne, Te, Vs)",1,CDF_UINT1
Flags_Ne,-,Flags characterizing the plasma density measurement,1,CDF_UINT1
Flags_Te,-,Flags characterizing the electron temperature measurement,1,CDF_UINT1
Flags_Vs,-,Flags characterizing the spacecraft potential measurement,1,CDF_UINT1
